description: Dozens of Egyptian women defied a nationwide ban on unsanctioned street protests on Sunday, rallying outside the presidential palace in Cairo.
title: Egyptian Women Defy Protest Ban to Call for Release of Political Prisoners
title_page: Egyptian Women Defy Protest Ban to Call for Release of Political Prisoners - The New York Times
text: The action was documented online by activists and journalists, although the police apparently sought to block filming of the demonstration, some arguing to Claire Read, a BBC correspondent, that the ban on unsanctioned protests also extended to reporting on them.
